short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Conveniently discover stocks while you browse. What would $100 be worth invested a year ago in this stock vs the S&P or Bitcoin?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It’s easy to procrastinate when it comes to investing.  One of the best things you can do is get started asap, even if it’s not a large amount. Foray helps remind you (as you browse normally) what a small investment would be worth today in the sites you frequent and also the broader S&P and even Bitcoin! 

Conveniently discover stocks while you browse. See the latest stock price in comparison to the overall market and other popular investments.  What would $100 a year ago be worth today?

Do you really need those new shoes? A $100 in TSLA a year ago would be buying your whole neighborhood shoes today! 

Foray is designed to "nudge" you into investing by conveniently showing you how your favorite public companies are doing in comparison to a couple of other benchmarks. (S&P 500 and Bitcoin.)
